Package org.palladiosimulator.analyzer.slingshot.simulation.api

Interface Simulation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimulationDriver
    public interface Simulation
    Describes the general simulation behavior.
    Author:
    Julijan Katic

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void init​(org.palladiosimulator.analyzer.slingshot.module.models.ModelModule modelInjector)
      Initialize the simulation with an Injector that is provided by the workflow for module injectors.
      default void init​(SimulationModel model)
      Deprecated.
      Use #init(Injector) instead.
      void startSimulation()
      Starts the simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        @Deprecated
default void init​(SimulationModel model)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated.
        Use #init(Injector) instead.
        Initialize the simulation. This should be done before starting the simulation and is generally not recommended to be called afterwards.
        Parameters:
        model - The model providing the information needed within the simulation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • startSimulation

        void startSimulation()
        Starts the simulation. Should only be called after init(SimulationModel).

      • init

        void init​(org.palladiosimulator.analyzer.slingshot.module.models.ModelModule modelInjector)
   throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize the simulation with an Injector that is provided by the workflow for module injectors. This should be called before the simulation starts (startSimulation()). The behavior is unknown if this method is called after the simulation has already started.
        Parameters:
        modelInjector - The injector with modules that can provide the models (and different data) needed during the simulation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
